titles.title: Jesus! how much Thy name unfolds

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus! how much Thy name unfolds To every opened ear; The pardoned sinner’s mem’ry holds None other half so dear.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thy name encircles every grace That God as man could show; There only could He fully trace A life divine below.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus—it speaks a life of love, Of sorrows meekly borne; It tells of sympathy above, Whatever makes us mourn.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus, the One who knew no sin, Made sin to make us just; Thou gav’st Thyself our love to win, Our full confiding trust.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The mention of Thy name shall bow Our hearts to worship Thee; The chiefest of ten thousand Thou, Whose love has set us free.
